name: Epidemic: Plagues & Prayers
description:
You control plagues! Infect a location with disease ridden smog and upgrade your plagues to conquer a medieval village. Observe the villager's behavior and daily routines. Plan your attack around the routines of the villagers and pay attention to the cleansing abilities of the church.

Features:

  • Control up to three plagues at the same time
  • Mix diseases for super synergy
  • Watch your diseases interact with the daily routines of the villagers
  • Blow up the infected with the doomsday button
  • Blazing fast sneezing and coughing action
